name: MotorStorm: Pacific Rift
description: It’s time to take to the starting grid again as the MotorStorm® festival heads to the tropics. MotorStorm® wowed racing fans with its heady formula of brutal, unpredictable off-road racing, festival vibes and stunning scenery. This new outing takes you to a solitary tropical paradise in the Pacific Ocean, ready for a whole new take on no-holds-barred racing action through thick swamps, dense jungle, towering peaks and steaming volcanoes.
